name: Balloony Breakout!
description:
Deep in the southern back-country sits a sleepy prison. Unfortunately, a large crate of hot-air balloons were delivered by accident. Now, prisoners are inflating their balloons and attempting to escape. It's up to the Warden and his team of crack-shot guards armed with rock-salt to shoot down the balloons and capture the wily prisoners before they get away.

Using a simple rubber-band style 'pull-aim-release' to shot at targets, players can enjoy this zany shooting gallery game set in the South.
